scripts.gen-verilization: rimraf src-gen && cargo run --quiet --manifest-path ../../../tools/verilization/rust/compiler-cli/Cargo.toml -- generate typescript -i ../verilization/tube.verilization -i ../../../tools/verilization/verilization/runtime/bool.verilization -i ../../../tools/verilization/verilization/runtime/integral.verilization -i ../../../tools/verilization/verilization/runtime/list.verilization -i ../../../tools/verilization/verilization/runtime/option.verilization -i ../../../tools/verilization/verilization/runtime/string.verilization -i ../../../tools/verilization/verilization/runtime/unit.verilization -o:out_dir src-gen -o:lib: @verilization/runtime -o:pkg:argon.tube tube
scripts.build: npm run gen-verilization && tsc --project tsconfig.json && rimraf lib && mkdirp lib && cpy "**/*" ../../lib --parents --cwd=out/src && cpy "**/*" ../../lib --parents --cwd=out/src-gen
